title: Privacy Policy
intro: At ToxiQR (www.toxiqr.com), we value your privacy and want to keep your personal data secure. This Privacy Policy is designed to describe how we collect, use, store, and disclose your data when you visit or use our website or mobile app. By visiting or using ToxiQR, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

imageUploads.title: Image Uploads
imageUploads.desc: By sending photos to ToxiQR for AI scanning, we receive the photos and hold them on a temporary basis to scan and identify the presence of venomous or non venomous species. You grant us permission to use the photo for:
points: Scientific research and public awareness campaigns
Education blogs or published news on wildlife identification and safety
We take care that no identifying personal information is associated with images published in any public or scientific environment.

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.desc: If you request professional confirmation or wish to be notified, we may retain your e-mail address or other contact information for the exclusive purpose of communicating results or information related to your inquiry.

technicalUsageData.title: Technical and Usage Data
technicalUsageData.desc: We are able to collect non-personal data like IP address, browser type, device information, accessed pages, time on site, and referring URLs. We use this data in tracking the performance of websites, improving user experience, and determining unauthorized misuse or abuse.

useYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
points: For providing accurate species identification using our AI facilities
For answering user queries and expert verification requests
For improving the functionality and security of our platform
For conducting scientific research or posting content for learning and knowledge reasons

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.desc: We process your information based on one or more of the following legal basis:
points: Your consent (e.g., sending photos, requesting us to confirm)
Legitimate interests in improving our services and promoting public knowledge

disclosure.title: Disclosure and Sharing of Data
disclosure.desc: ToxiQR does not sell or rent out your personal data to other parties. We might disclose your data:
points: To service providers assisting in website operation (under strict confidentiality agreements)
When required by law or to respond to lawful requests from public authorities
To protect the rights, property, or safety of ToxiQR, our users, or others

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.desc: Uploaded images and associated data are retained only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy. Irrelevant or unused data may be deleted periodically.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.desc: Depending on where you are, you may be entitled to:
points: Have access to the personal data we retain about you
Have your information corrected or removed
Object or restrict specific processing activities
Withdraw consent at any time (without affecting any prior processing)
To exercise any of these, please contact us on:

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.desc: We take the proper technical and organizational measures to protect your data. There is no way that is 100% secure, but we aim to keep your information safe from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

childPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childPrivacy.desc: ToxiQR is not designed for kids under 13 years old. We don't knowingly collect information from kids. If we find this type of information has been collected, we will delete it immediately.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.desc: We may change this Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage the users to visit this page often. Continued use of ToxiQR after changes will be deemed to be your consent to the new policy.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: Email: support@toxiqr.com
